subject: Soccer
Stadiums and Arenas
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Discussions of settling on a permanent stadium for the team rarely get anywhere, the federation president says, because the idea “doesn’t make much sense.”
snippet: Discussions of settling on a permanent stadium for the team rarely get anywhere, the federation president says, because the idea “doesn’t make much sense.”
